participant_1.background:
I love being able to use my music to help children in need.
I am a twenty five year old comic book collector.
I've been working at my parents' business since I was a kid, so I've got a lot of experience in the field.
i play the bass guitar.
i m not a nice person.

participant_2.background:
I like to keep in touch with my friends and family on social media, but I don't spend all my time on it.
I prefer to listen to music that gets my blood pumping and gets me ready to take on the day.
I take a moment to myself and listen to some calming music.
i always have a beer after work.
i like to make boats on the weekends.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to make boats on the weekends and go for walks in the park.
Oh, that sounds really cool! I like to play the bass guitar.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but I really like playing country music.
Oh, that's cool! I like listening to country music, but I don't play any instruments.
Well, if you ever want to learn, I'd be happy to teach you!
That's so kind of you! I might just take you up on that offer.
Awesome! I'm always looking for new people to play music with.
Well, I'm definitely not the best musician, but I'm willing to learn.
That's all you need! Everyone has to start somewhere.
Thanks for being so encouraging! I'm excited to start learning how to play the bass guitar.
You're welcome! I'm happy to help
